reviews.review: The best multiplayer FPS you'll find technically. Everything that can be said about it, most likely has. If you think the game is bad, you'll find it's most likely the players that cause it. Cheating is common in non-prime matchmaking, which is mandatory to play if you're F2P (you can buy prime, or acquire it through levelling) and there's a chance you'll find it in Prime anyway. It's pot luck if you're soloing on competitive matchmaking as to whether you'll get teammates that want to actively work as a group or toxic "teammates".
It's the best game I've played.Congratulations gaben. All u need to improve is your anti-cheat system :)

КС - это классика. Устал от обыденных игр? Проблемы с девушкой? Нужно убить время? Тогда поиграй в родную, всеми любимыми КСочку. Да, читаки конечно имеются, но это поправимо - вступай в патруль, лови негодяев и получай бонусный опыт.

TBH THE RUSSIANS ON THIS GAME REALLY REALLY HURT MY FEELINGS. Sorry for caps but i was in a really bad state of mind and it almost brought me to the point of dehydration. overall the game has had a negative impact on my life as a whole and the dirty hackers at the end of the day get the last laugh. i feel really passionate about this game and therefore cannot stop playing as it calms my tourettes and allows me to shout down the mic. I am addicted and cant help but tap them heads and slap that ass if u know what i mean. 

i was diagnosed with bend nose disease and this has mean that i have a weird voice like mickey  mouse. this effects my in game vice and i get made bullied for this reason. to conclude on this game i have now decided that the constant seizures i have due to epilepsy that this game in-tales. i see my adventure of this game ending soon but this chapter has made me the man i am today. i thank u, yes u Gaben for this epilepsy and how shit u have made my life. plz give me a knife and i will forgive. 

but for now just remember this gamers U do U babes
